column4: any1 knows where i can change the 15 minuts of the sudo command (so i can set it to 1 hour or something?)
You must edit the /etc/sudoers file with the visudo command. See man visudo and see passwd_timeout in man sudoers for more information.
thnx have an look to it...thnx !
Sure, and good luck with it. For a quick fix, you can type sudo -k to reset the timer manually at any time. (:
